Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Commissariats[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Free Constabulary when you conquer a City, and +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from Constabularies.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Source: Wikipedia (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Military_commissariat)[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Military commissariat is a local military administrative agency in the former Soviet Union as well as in present-day Russia and some other CIS countries that prepares and executes plans for military mobilization, maintains records on military manpower and economic resources available to the armed forces, provides premilitary training, drafts men for military service, organizes reserves for training, and performs other military functions at the local level.
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Commissariats[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Free Constabulary when you conquer a City, and +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from Constabularies.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Source: Wikipedia (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Military_commissariat)[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Military commissariat is a local military administrative agency in the former Soviet Union as well as in present-day Russia and some other CIS countries that prepares and executes plans for military mobilization, maintains records on military manpower and economic resources available to the armed forces, provides premilitary training, drafts men for military service, organizes reserves for training, and performs other military functions at the local level.
